Headline: #74 Fullerton Temporary Reroute at Fullerton/Monticello
ShortDescription: 74 Fullerton buses are temporarily rerouted via Fullerton, Pulaski, Armitage, Central Park & Fullerton, due to street blockage near Fullerton/Monticello.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#74 Fullerton buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Fullerton, Pulaski, Armitage, Central Park, then resume their normal route at Fullerton, due to street blockage near Fullerton/Monticello.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #2 Hyde Park Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Hyde Park Blvd/Kimbark
ShortDescription: SB 2 Hyde Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Park, 55th and Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near Hyde Park Blvd/Kimbark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #2 Hyde Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Park, 55th and Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near Hyde Park Blvd/Kimbark.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Forest Park
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Forest Park due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Forest Park due to a mechanical problem.

Shuttle buses are requested between Forest Park and UIC-Halsted to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
